entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cowansville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
